tweetSentenceList.constTree: (ROOT (S (NP (PRP$ Our) (NN pastor)) (VP (VBD asked) (S (NP (PRP us)) (VP (TO to) (VP (VP (VB join) (PP (IN in) (NP (PRP him))) (PP (IN in) (NP (NN fasting))) (, ,) (PP (IN for) (NP (CD 40) (NNS days))) (, ,) (PP (IN in) (NP (DT this)))) (: :) (VP (VP (VB eat) (ADJP (JJ right))) (CC and) (VP (NN exercise))))))) (. .)))
